tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Shalini has been a big pillar of support for us, in dealing with the niggling issues of our new born. She is very friendly and answered all all our queries, even the naive ones and took away a lot of our worries in dealing with a pre term baby. Dr. Shalini gave us a lot of tips in dealing with the new born, especially pre term with reflux issues which greatly helped us improve the feed retention and gain weight. It's only been a little over 2 weeks but Dr. Shalini already feels like the family doctor for our kid. Thank you, doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shalini is approachable and friendly.  Extremely happy with  her diagnosis and  treatment. I have been consulting her for all minor to moderate  health issues during my son’s  growing up phase.  *** ** *** **** ************** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My son was born at the hospital where Dr. Shalini practiced and she was his first pediatrician. She is friendly, patient and attentive to our queries. She is quick to allay unnecessary fears that us first time parents often conjur up and prefers to keep medications to a minimum on carefull assessment. We only moved away from her as we shifted to a new locality. Wishing you the best

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** **** ******* Very nice attention given to babies health, most of the times diagnosis  has been very perfect and baby's health issue has been cleared soon.
The doctor took time and explained all the required details necessary. She answered all our questions and did not rush us up which is what we wanted. Good experience overall.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Most patient and friendly doctor you could have for your kid. she doesn't prescribe anything more that what is needed and very careful with her diagnosis. only wish we stayed closer to the hospital...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have had a very good experience with the doctor through the journey. She is patient enough to hear our queries and respond to them

review: We are happy with the way our baby’s health is discussed and explained. Our fears (as new parents) are alleviated. The solutions which address our concerns about our baby are effective. We would recommend Dr Marie Shalini to other parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very friendly. She understood the issue and treated the child with care. I liked the way she handled the child.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She has a startling reputation and recommendation hence despite the distance we made an appointment. Not only were all our questions discarded with, “ That happens”  it almost felt like the silliest decision to consult with her. She seemed both rushed and disinterested.  It was almost like we were coercing her to give us a detailed explanation *** ******* *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Friendly and approachable. Good suggestions on how to look after baby and not panic about anything .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Amazing dr, she is very friendly n approachable.
Definitely recommend this doctor. I have visited her for both my kids

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: ** * ******* ** **** **** ** ********* *** ******* * ******** *** ** very good with babies. She looks into all aspects of the child’s health and suggests appropriate medicines and treatment ( including nutrition) when required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a great doctor. Very approachable and friendly. My daughter was in the NICU FOR 12 days n very sick she helped us through n handed over my lil one in my hands…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Great doctor patient relationship. Dr. Shalini Marie Chicco is always ready to help and is very approachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Secured & blessed feeling to be associated with Dr. Shalini. Listens to all our queries patiently and does give the best solution for her patients. Our 5 day old baby is cared well and I am geeatful to Doctor and her entire team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Shalini is so friendly and I strongly recommend this doctor. we found difficult when she was on her maternity leave since she was so nice to us lik a family member.Thank you doctor for being such a lovely person.
